actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: To establish an endowment to assist the University of Hawaii in making grants for the development of education programs which target Filipinos.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education to make a grant to the University of Hawaii to establish an endowment fund to award grants to institutions of higher education within its educational system for the development of education programs targeting Filipinos. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To establish an endowment to assist the University of Hawaii in making grants for the development of education programs which target Filipinos.
